title: 4 Bed 2 Bath Home For Rent In Irving Park
map_address: North Lawndale Ave near W Berteau Ave
posting_body: Rare opportunity to rent a fully remodeled 4 bed 2 bath single family home in desirable Irving Park!
Step into a wide-open floor plan with beautiful hardwood floors and stunning kitchen featuring quartz countertops, premium stainless steel appliances, and two-toned cabinetry.
This home boasts designer quality bathrooms, main floor laundry with Samsung washer & dryer, Kohler fixtures, black accents throughout, and large bedrooms with plenty of closet space.
The partially finished basement offers a secondary living space and tons of storage options.
Enjoy the rear bonus sunroom that leads to a fenced in backyard with a large concrete patio and brand new 2 car garage.
Great location with easy access to the highway and 15 minute walk to Irving Park Metra/Blue Line.
Tenant to maintain lawn and pay all utilities including gas, electric, water, and cable.
700+ credit scores and combined gross monthly income must be greater than 3x rent.
$500/applicant non-refundable move in fee and $350/pet fee.
